verbose_text: Differences in the expression of CD43, CD62L, and KLRG1 on both the endogenous and transferred OVA specific CD8 + T cells were also observed between the two groups of mice, with a greater proportion of cells from mice that received CD40L-competent cells being polarized toward the effector phenotype based on lower CD62L and higher KLRG1 expression, even in the endogenous OVA specific cells.
